line.comment: * Add-Ons 1.2: Fixed a bug where scanning a stolen ship while joining the OCV will give the ship.
* Add-Ons 1.4.25: Fix mission being added to mission entry if the original station was destroyed. Update the mission only if the original station still exists.

* Add-Ons 1.1: We need to check if there's enough free space (6 units since a passenger takes 6 volume). If not, we free up some space by deleting a tiny amount of the ware and then add the passenger.
* Edge case: the freighter unintentionally picked up artefacts. This'll never happen intentionally, but in the 1-in-a-billion odds, check it anyway.
* Compute the total volume of the ware. totalVolume / ware.qty
* Compute the unit volume of the ware.
* How many units to remove to cover deficit.
* Add-Ons 1.4: Because a freighter may have the firewall software (it's expensive!), we don't want the player to keep it upon transferring ownership.
* if not $ship-> get amount of ware $license in cargo bay
* $time = get in-game date string: time= $playtime include time= [TRUE]
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.SendMessage' : message=$t log=[TRUE] forceDisplay=[FALSE] delayMs=10000 author=null

sval.val: Add-Ons 1.2: Fixed a bug where scanning a stolen ship while joining the OCV will give the ship.
Add-Ons 1.4.25: Fix mission being added to mission entry if the original station was destroyed. Update the mission only if the original station still exists.
Add-Ons 1.1: We need to check if there's enough free space (6 units since a passenger takes 6 volume). If not, we free up some space by deleting a tiny amount of the ware and then add the passenger.
Edge case: the freighter unintentionally picked up artefacts. This'll never happen intentionally, but in the 1-in-a-billion odds, check it anyway.
Compute the total volume of the ware. totalVolume / ware.qty
Compute the unit volume of the ware.
How many units to remove to cover deficit.
Add-Ons 1.4: Because a freighter may have the firewall software (it's expensive!), we don't want the player to keep it upon transferring ownership.
if not $ship-> get amount of ware $license in cargo bay
$time = get in-game date string: time= $playtime include time= [TRUE]
START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.SendMessage' : message=$t log=[TRUE] forceDisplay=[FALSE] delayMs=10000 author=null
